fileName.description: path of the raw data file

fileAlias.description: path of the raw data file alias; a copy or symlink of the raw data file with the file hash as the alias basename

fileCategory.description: file category; usually the file extension

fileContent.description: file content; e.g. if category is 'xls', content is bank statement data

fileMimeType.description: file mime type; e.g. application/zip, text/plain, text/x-shellscript, ...

fileMimeEncoding.description: file mime encoding; e.g. binary, us-ascii, ...

filePedigree.description: pedigree of the data file; stored as id of ancestor file instance

encrypted.description: boolean indicating whether the file is encrypted

quarantined.description: boolean indicating whether the file is quarantined (containing malware, virus, ...)

jobDefinition.description: ETL job definition(s) used to process the file (separated by ',')

lastProcessed.description: date (GMT timestamp) file was last ETL'd

dateCreated.description: date (timestamp) instance was created in data source
